page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT _ NEWCASTLE E.
page.content: Walkergate{Social Club}has 1008 members and 14 staff.At the weekends when they are busiest they have discos quizzes,films and singing groups.There are many{public houses}and several {community halls}for bingo,dances,etc. There are some areas of{open land } which are used for children's games and{parks}for organized games such as cricket,football,tennis and bowls. There are at least 2 purpose_built BMX tracks.Benfield{Boys' Club}is an example of a club for boys and girls from 5_18yrs which is open 5 days a week.There are organized trips,boxing, discos,snooker,football,darts,shooting craft and drawing sessions and a shop to buy sweets.A few people keep horses on the open fields.
